thread.title: RHOBH's Erika Girardi Is Joining Season 24 Of Dancing With The Stars!
thread.title_full: RHOBH's Erika Girardi Is Joining Season 24 Of Dancing With The Stars!

author: Perez Hilton
title: RHOBH's Erika Girardi Is Joining Season 24 Of Dancing With The Stars!
text:
Erika Girardi is going to pat her puss on ABC !
According to sources, the Real Housewives Of Beverly Hills star is going to join the cast of Dancing With The Stars season 24!
Related: Erika Girardi Went Commando On RHOBH 
Considering the reality TV personality doubles as a dance-pop-diva -- known famously as Erika Jayne -- we have a feeling she's going to do QUITE well in the competition.
As we reported , there are rumors that Nancy Kerrigan , Simone Biles , and a member of Fifth Harmony are also joining the DWTS cast.
Dance your ass off, girl! 
[ Image via WENN . ]
